body:
Joe on FB requested for the following cards:
Ancestral Recall
Arcane Denial
Foil
Force of will
mana drain
Daze
Isochron Scepter
author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)
title: Card request

comments.body:
Ancestral Recall - added by revision 33d74096a0 Arcane Denial - we don't support 'at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep'
Foil - we don't support discarding as an alternative cost
Force of Will - we don't support life pay or exiling as an alternative cost
Mana Drain -  we don't have a mana pool
Daze - we don't support returning a card as an alternative cost
Isochron Scepter - we don't support the imprint mechanism

Oh how I wish we had support for alternative casting costs ...

**Status:** Fixed
comments.author: [BeHold...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/116281131070537299190/)
